cinnamon.engine.utils

Interface RotatableEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, Partitionable, Position, Rotation, Size
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolygonEntity

    public interface RotatableEntity
extends Entity

    Describes an Entity that can be rotated about its pivot.

    Created by chris on 5/31/2017.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void rotateBy(double angle)
      Rotates by an angle from the current rotation.
      void rotateTo(double angle)
      Rotates to an angle from a rotation of 0.

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Entity

        getPivotX, getPivotY

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Position

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Size

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Rotation

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Partitionable

        getBounds

    • Method Detail

      • rotateBy

        void rotateBy(double angle)

        Rotates by an angle from the current rotation.

        The Entity's pivot is used to form the origin around which rotation is performed i.e. position + pivot = rotation origin.

        Parameters:
        angle - in radians.

      • rotateTo

        void rotateTo(double angle)

        Rotates to an angle from a rotation of 0.

        The Entity's pivot is used to form the origin around which rotation is performed i.e. position + pivot = rotation origin.

        Parameters:
        angle - in radians.
